description.value:
Requires Wielding Two Light Weapons

Once per turn, after you take the Attack action and attack with a light melee weapon that you’re holding in one hand, you can use a bonus action to make two attacks with a different light melee weapon that you’re holding in the other hand—instead of the one attack typically granted by two-weapon fighting. Don’t add your ability modifier to the damage of these additional attacks unless the modifier is negative.
